text: Converts the input volume/VDB field to a VDB vector field and updates how the vector field will respond to transformations downstream.

Labs VDB Transform Properties SOP changes how a volume/VDB field will respond to transformations applied downstream. It converts the input field to a VDB vector field and updates the vector field’s primitive intrinsic attribute
A common use case is to convert
to a VDB contravariant relative vector field so that the velocities can respond correctly to both Transform SOPs and object transforms.
The name of the volume/VDB field to update. If this is three scalar fields which are components of the same vector field, just type in the name of the vector field. For instance, for
Sets how transformations will be applied to the vector field.
: Applies the inverse-transpose of the transform matrix, ignoring translation.
: Applies the forward transform matrix, ignoring translation.
: Applies the forward transform matrix, ignoring translation.
Deletes the scalar VDBs once they have been merged into a single vector field.
Outputs motion vector visualization. You can still revert the volume back to its original look downstream by deleting the detail attribute
